tmpl:
{{#if ${bannerLists}}}
{{#${bannerLists}}}
{{#eq type 1}} {{#if href}} {{/if}}
{{{lazyImage imgUrl "title='{{title}}' alt='{{title}}'" 'true'}}}
{{#if href}} {{/if}} {{/eq}} {{#eq type 2}}
{{{lazyImage video.imgUrl "title='{{${eq type 2$title}}}' alt='{{${eq type 2$title}}}'" 'false'}}}
{{/eq}}
{{#if title}}

{{${if title$title}}}

{{/if}} {{#if subTitle}}
{{${if subTitle$subTitle}}}
{{/if}} {{#if summary}}

{{${if summary$summary}}}

{{/if}}
{{/${bannerLists}}}
{{#if ${navigation}}}
{{/if}}
{{#${bannerLists}}}
{{#eq type 1}}
{{{lazyImage imgUrl "title='{{${bannerLists$title}}}' alt='{{${bannerLists$title}}}'" 'true'}}}
{{/eq}} {{#eq type 2}}
{{{lazyImage video.imgUrl "title='{{${eq type 2$title}}}' alt='{{${eq type 2$title}}}'" 'true'}}}
{{/eq}}
{{/${bannerLists}}}
{{^}} {{{noDataPrompt}}} {{/if}}
